message: I walk down the main street toward Oval Tower.
The air is charged with excitement as the parade passes by, mascots and musicians and dancers whipping the crowd into a frenzy.
Some guests are dancing right along with them, while others are huddled together, embracing. It's even more over the top than it looked on TV.
The streets get more crowded the closer I get to the tower.
By the time we reach the plaza, it's almost impossible to move.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, fuck..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Woah!"

name: 男性客Ｂ
message: "Hurray for Platinum Jail!!!"
Someone bumps into me from behind, and then some guy I've never met pulls me into a hug.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let me go...!"

name: 男性客Ｂ
message: "Ahaha, isn't Toue the best?!"
I peel him off me and escape.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell? Was he drunk?"
Not a moment later...

name: 女性客Ｂ
message: "Mr. Toue is the best!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "H-Hey!"
This time, a woman tries to grab me. I push through the crowd to get away.
This was a bad idea. No way I'm making it through this crowd.
And to make matters worse, while I'm struggling, everyone around me is having the time of their life.
Something about it is really... unsettling.
Just then, the big screens dotting the plaza fill with static.
When it clears, I see a feed of the plaza. A jubilant roar goes up from the crowd.
...It's time.

name: 女アナウンサー
message: "Ladies and gentlemen, thank you all for your patience. Mr. Toue Tatsuo is here with a special message for us all."
Shouts and applause thunder in my ears as a man steps out onto the tower's balcony.
The screens switch to a closeup. Toue is standing there, flanked by two guards.
Another man stands a few steps behind him. His head is lowered, so I can't see his face.

name: 東江
message: "...My friends."
Instantly, the roaring crowd falls silent.
Everyone is hanging on Toue's next words.
He sweeps his gaze over the crowd, his smile calm, indulgent.

name: 東江
message: "I would like to begin by thanking you for joining me today."

name: 東江
message: "Time flies, doesn't it? Ten years have passed since Platinum Jail opened its doors."

name: 東江
message: "Indeed, time stops for no man. But that is precisely why I sought to create a paradise where you might all be happy for the time you have."

name: 東江
message: "But what is happiness, exactly? That question is never far from my mind. Happiness is not something that everyone can obtain with ease."

name: 東江
message: "Naturally, the path to happiness is different for each individual, but this is what I believe:"

name: 東江
message: "Happiness is the freedom to laugh from the bottom of your heart, to know joy and forgiveness, and to feel safe and secure."

name: 東江
message: "Should all people come to know this freedom, strife shall vanish from the face of the earth."

name: 東江
message: "It is said that pain nourishes the soul. Perhaps that is true. But do you not find that anger, sorrow, and suffering take up more of your lives than joy?"

name: 東江
message: "While you are here, I want you to forget all your pain, all your suffering, and give yourselves over to pure joy."

name: 東江
message: "I want this place to become a second home to you all. That is my wish."

name: 東江
message: "For all of you to know happiness."
With a hand to his heart, Toue solemnly bows his head.
After a brief silence, the crowd bursts into thunderous applause.
Everyone is clapping their hands, shouting Toue's name, whistling and screaming.
Even I join in, thinking it safest to play along.
Honestly, though? It feels like a cult or something.
After basking in the crowd's adulation for a time, Toue again motions for silence.
